Experiment Name: str: string describing the experiment, usually related to the selected DL framework/architecture. Example: "nnDet_3D_fullres"
Seed: int: random seed number used when randomizing events and actions. Example: 12345
label_suffix: str: file suffix (including file extension) of the files containing the label map. Example: "_mask.nii.gz"
Modalities: Dict[str,str]: dictionary listing the input modalities. The key-value pair contains the file suffix as key and the modality name as value. Example: "_image.nii.gz": "CT"
label_dict: Dict[str,str]: dictionary describing the labels (excluding the background). The key-value pair contains the label value as key and the label description as value. Example: "1": "ABD_Lymph_Node"
n_folds: int: number of folds to run cross-vvalidation. Example: 5.
DatasetName: str: string describing the dataset. Example: "LymphNodeSeg_ABD"
FileExtension: str: string for the file extension of the dataset. "Example: .nii.gz"
